text: Knema furfuracea is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Peninsular Malaysia, Singapore and Thailand. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema furfuracea. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Knema furfuracea
